backoff_retry_count.title: Retry Count
backoff_retry_count.description: Number of sync retry attempts using exponential backoff

chunking_strategy.title: Chunking Strategy
chunking_strategy.description: Chunking strategy (timestamp, uses Split Vector strategy if the field is left empty)

database.title: Database Name
database.description: Name of the mongodb database selected for replication

hosts.title: Hosts
hosts.description: Specifies the hostnames or IP addresses of MongoDB for connection

max_threads.title: Max Threads
max_threads.description: Max parallel threads for chunk snapshotting

password.title: Password
password.description: Password with the username for authentication

srv.title: Use SRV
srv.description: Enable this option if using DNS SRV connection strings. When set to true, the hosts field must contain only one entry - a DNS SRV address (['mongodataset.pigiy.mongodb.net'])
